title: WHY WONT LEAVERBUSTER WARNING GO AWAY????
body:
Why is this game website, keep popping up with the LEAVERBUSTER WARNING Message on my Screen???
all I did was sign into this game a few minuets ago and I sign in and all of a sudden that message poped up and now it wont go away,
and the "OK" button is "not" lite up and I "can't" Hit the ok button and all I wanted to do today was play on this game with out no Interruptions!!!!
is that sooooooo hard to understand? :( and I AM SOOOOOOOOOOO ANGRY AND MAD AND FURIOUS AND FRUSTEDTRAED!!! I JUST WANT TO PLAY THE GAME. MAKE THIS STUPID DUMB LEAVERBUSTER WARNING MESSAGE GO AWAY?????? {{champion:22}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:22}} {{summoner:13}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: happened to me to can anyone help

That's pretty strange, I've got your account pulled up right now and you don't currently have any kind of penalties like a leaverbuster on your account. Could this be in reference to a different account, and if not, could you shoot me a picture of the leaverbuster warning so I can see what's going on there?
